Class StringResource

All Implemented Interfaces:
ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.RequestHandler, java.lang.Comparable<ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.Resource>
public class StringResource
extends ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.LocalResource

The Class StringResource implements the top resource to register a persisting service for a device resource returning string values.

Constructor Summary

          Instantiates a new string resource and sets the resource identifier.

Method Detail

performGET

public void performGET(ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.GETRequest request)
perform GET acts on get requests and responds with a list of all subresources with the resource identifier and the corresponding device.

Responose format:
resid = RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER; device = DEVICE_PATH

Specified by:
performGET in interface ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.RequestHandler
Overrides:
performGET in class ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.LocalResource

performPOST

public void performPOST(ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.POSTRequest request)
perform POST acts on post requests and creates a new subresource if the payload was specified correctly. Otherwise it responds with an error message.

Payload format:
resid = RESOURCE_IDENTIFIER
deviceroot = ROOT_PATH
deviceres = /RES_PATH

Specified by:
performPOST in interface ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.RequestHandler
Overrides:
performPOST in class ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.LocalResource
